Content: Military pressure is created by fleets (may be scaled if they anchored
for a certain time) and flows troughout the systems. Within this
systems in counters danger and therby pacifies the population/makes
them less weary/more loyal/ happy. It also signals military build up,
since it should trickle into foreign systems. (Military pressure should
be handeled on the highest possible level to avoid memory cluttering
and make it easier for the AI to distribute resources.)
